page.prototype: L InsertRow (Row as SQL::RowSnapshot [, InsertBefore as N = 1 ] )

argument.name: Row
argument.description: A SQL::RowSnapshot that contains the row of data to insert into the table.

argument.name: InsertBefore
argument.description: Optional. Default value 1. A numeric value that specifies what row to insert the data before. A value of 1 inserts the row at the beginning of the table.

page.description: Inserts a RowSnapshot into the collection of row snapshots just prior to the row specified by the argument named InsertBefore.
page.discussion: Returns true if the row was inserted and false if there was an error.
